name: FALL DEEP INSANITY
description:
(R16+ WARNING: This game contains mature themes, profanity and topics involving the use of recreational drugs.)

For the best experience playing FALL DEEP INSANITY, we recommend that Windows and Linux users download the binaries for their respective operating systems in lieu of playing in-browser.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Rico Guzmán is none other than your average 20-year-old college pothead from the city of Kasprzak, Ohio. After getting a mystery drug forcefully injected into him by the mad-scientist-in-disguise Hans Reuter, he must figure out a way to escape his secret laboratory before it's too late!

FALL DEEP INSANITY is a dark humor platformer game about *falling deeper and deeper into oblivion*. Traverse 5 levels that start off easy and become increasingly difficult over time, while trying to keep your sanity meter high in the process! Let your meter run out, and bad things will happen. What kind of things? Drug things.

Good luck.

---------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

E - Interact

LMB - Advance Dialogue

---------------------------------------------------------------

NOTICE:
